track.name: Introduction to Cybersecurity
track.description: Foundation track covering CIA, risk fundamentals, kill chain, MITRE ATT&CK, and compliance basics.

challenges.title: M1: CIA Triad - Integrity Breach
challenges.description: Scenario: A hospital patient database was modified by an unauthorized user. Identify the primary CIA pillar impacted and submit the canonical flag.

challenges.title: M1: CIA Triad - Multi Impact Classification
challenges.description: Scenario bundle: data leak, website downtime, and modified logs. Identify the CIA impact sequence and submit the canonical flag.

challenges.title: M2: Threat vs Vulnerability vs Risk
challenges.description: Given an unpatched Apache server, an active attacker, and financial loss, classify each item correctly as threat, vulnerability, or risk impact.

challenges.title: M3: Attack Surface Mapping
challenges.description: Analyze a target profile with web app, API, exposed SSH, and phishing vector. Map digital, physical, and human attack surfaces.

challenges.title: M4: Threat Actor - APT Identification
challenges.description: Profile a long dwell-time supply-chain intrusion with advanced tradecraft and classify the most likely threat actor category.

challenges.title: M5: Cyber Kill Chain Mapping
challenges.description: Map an intrusion timeline to kill chain phases: delivery, exploitation, installation, command and control, and actions on objectives.

challenges.title: M6: MITRE ATT&CK Mapping
challenges.description: Map credential dumping, SMB lateral movement, and DNS-based exfiltration events to their ATT&CK tactics.

challenges.title: M7: Cyber Law - Data Protection Violation
challenges.description: Assess a case where user data is stored without adequate protection controls and identify the violated compliance principle.
